meanings.definition: A person or thing from or related to Bangladesh.
meanings.sent1: Many deshis celebrate Bengali New Year with traditional dances.
meanings.sent2: The deshis at the event wore colorful saris and kurtas.
meanings.sent3: The deshis brought delicious Bangladeshi sweets to the potluck.
meanings.sent4: The vibrant culture of the deshis brightened up the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: I always look forward to the deshis' lively music performances.

meanings.definition: Plural form of deshi, meaning a person or thing from or related to Bangladesh.
meanings.sent1: The market was bustling with vendors selling goods to deshis.
meanings.sent2: We invited all the deshis in our community to the festival.
meanings.sent3: The deshis organized a charity drive to help those in need.
meanings.sent4: The unity among the deshis was truly inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The deshis' traditional attire added a colorful touch to the event.
